snippet.title: Samorost 3 Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Samorost 3 is an adventure game by Amanita Design, the makers of Machinarium and Botanicula. The game will be released in the first quarter of 2016.
 
More info at http://samorost3.net/ or http://amanita-design.net.
Follow us on Twitter (http://twitter.com/Amanita_Design), facebook (http://www.facebook.com/Amanita.Design) or G+ (http://plus.google.com/+amanitadesign/posts).
